title: PPT by GPTSci
description: PPT by GPTSci revolutionizes the way you create presentations by seamlessly converting images into fully editable PowerPoint elements. Say goodbye to tedious manual work—our app lets you transform visuals into PPT slides in seconds. But that's not all; you can also refine and customize your slides using simple natural language commands. Perfect for professionals, educators, and anyone looking to elevate their presentations with ease and precision. Video tutorial: youtube.com/@GPTSci
